content: WASHINGTON  Jan 26 Lockheed Martin Corp  on Tuesday said it would combine its information systems and government services business with Leidos Holdings Inc  receiving a one-time payment of $1.8 billion and a 50.5 percent equity stake in Leidos.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: Lockheed to get $1.8 bln from services merger with Leidos

content: Leidos Holdings Inc  is nearing a deal to merge with the government information technology and services businesses being shed by Lockheed Martin Corp  in a deal that could value these assets at around $5 billion  people familiar with the matter said.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: Exclusive: Leidos nears $5 billion deal for Lockheed's IT businesses - sources

content: Jan 19 Leidos Holdings Inc is nearing a deal to merge with the government information technology and services businesses being shed by Lockheed Martin Corp  in a deal that could value these assets at around $5 billion  people familiar with the matter said.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: EXCLUSIVE-Leidos nears $5 bln deal for Lockheed's IT businesses -sources

content: WASHINGTON The U.S. Defense Department on Wednesday awarded a team led by Leidos Holdings Inc a contract valued at up to $4.34 billion to build a new electronic health record system for 9.6 million current and retired military service members.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: Leidos team wins $4.34 billion contract for U.S. military health records

content: WASHINGTON  July 29 The U.S. Defense Department on Wednesday awarded a team led by Leidos Holdings Inc  a contract valued at up to $4.34 billion to build a new electronic health record system for 9.6 million current and retired military service members.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Leidos team wins $4.34 bln contract for U.S. military health records

content: WASHINGTON  July 29 The U.S. Defense Department on Wednesday said it chose a team led by Leidos Holdings Inc  to build a new electronic health record system for 9.6 million current and retired military service members  a contract valued at around $9 billion over the next 18 years.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: Leidos team wins huge U.S. military healthcare records contract

content: CACI International Inc  Booz Allen Hamilton Holdings and Leidos Holdings Inc have held exploratory discussions to acquire Computer Sciences Corp's public sector division  people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: Exclusive: CACI  Booz Allen  Leidos eye CSC's government unit - sources

content: Science Applications International Corp  a provider of information technology and engineering services to governments  said on Sunday it will acquire Scitor Corp  a smaller peer  for $790 million in cash.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: Exclusive: Science Applications to buy Scitor for $790 million

content: LONDON  Feb 19 Britain said it would award a contract to run military logistics to Leidos Holdings Inc   a U.S. company specialising in defence and health services  as part of a plan to save 500 million pounds ($772 million) over 13 years.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Britain to award U.S. firm Leidos military logistics contract

content: LONDON  Feb 19 Britain said it would award a contract to run military logistics to Leidos Holdings Inc   a U.S. company specialising in defence and health services  as part of a plan to save 500 million pounds ($772 million) over 13 years.
name: Leidos Holdings Inc
title: Britain to award U.S. firm Leidos military logistics contract
